Name: Capricious Visage
Title: Preponderant Recollection: Capricious Visage
Desc: Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.\nThough this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...

Talent.Name: Capricious Visage
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
